lead_paragraph: Wall Street banks have been buffeted by tumultuous financial markets, but Goldman Sachs had particularly weak results because of its focus on trading.

headline.print_headline: Hard Quarter Has Goldman Defending Its Strategy
headline.main: After a Rough Quarter, Goldman Faces Questions on Strategy

snippet: Wall Street banks have been buffeted by tumultuous financial markets, but Goldman Sachs had particularly weak results because of its focus on trading.
abstract: Goldman Sachs faces difficult questions after reporting worst quarterly results of any major bank, particularly regarding its decision to focus on trading and investing businesses; reports earnings of $1.1 billion, or $2.68 per share, down 55 percent from period year earlier; report marks bank's lowest profit and revenue since 2004.
